spec_data.Name: shared-color-targets
spec_data.License: GPLv2+ and Public Domain and CC-BY-SA
spec_data.Description:
The shared-color-targets package contains various targets which are
useful for programs that create ICC profiles.
This package only contains the free targets that can be safely
distributed with Fedora.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:59:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Shared color targets for creating color profiles
